sense.def:
Kadar je človek
in the midst of a group of people
, je sredi skupine ljudi in ga obkrožajo.

seg.quote: I found him in the midst of a group of his friends.
We have in our midst two Nobel prize-winners.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
in the midst of an event
, se zgodi sredi tega dogodka. Kadar je človek
in the midst of doing something
, ta hip dela tisto.

seg.quote: In the midst of this humiliating scandal, news arrived of Mr Hodge's resignation.
Brody was in the midst of swallowing a bite of egg salad sandwich.
